Topic.Title: Yahoo must be purposely destroying the Yahoo Finance Message Boards.....

Message.Title: simple and smart way to move this stock to $20 a share
Message.Msg: a simple way to move this stock up and benifit all shareholders and the board would be to pay a quartarly dividend of .25 . vast benifits are: 1: give marissa and board time to turn around company whille paying out little cash in meantime 2: 1 dollar div a year amounts to 7% at these levels and 5% even at 20. ten yr t bond 1.7% 3: will attract vast fund buying from dividend seeking funds and anyone looking for a return 4: even after 4 yrs will have only distributed the first after tax payment from alibaba 5: will reward long term shareholders and put a squeeze on shorts(up move and dividend) 6: avoids a bail out of stock if big dividend issued after the issuance would love to hear comments especailly from dan loeb...lol

Message.Title: The new format for YMB
Message.Msg: Hello Marissa; Your new management way of directing just how things should be does not live up to very high standards. The changes made on YMB (Yahoo message board) are very upsetting to the users. Please read some of the comments that we the users have posted. You were asking for improvement suggestions, but it seems that your "team" just went their own way and gave Us, the users, the customers and investors the Royal Shaft. Please go back to the conference room and have a open discussion with your staff and encourage them to find the right path back to the hearts and minds of the investors that have used YMB in the past. Now, if you need some ideas on how to make your product better feel free to EM me and I will answer you. Keep well, R........Ps I am a L&S (Long and Strong) holder of ARNA.

Message.Title: Would Yahoo pop from $15 to $25?
Message.Msg: Alibaba is going to pay Yahoo total around $15B in the future which represents $12 per share. If Yahoo sells Yahoo Japen, it could get another $6B - $7B which represents around $5 per share. After tax, Yahoo might get $12 + $5 = $17 - $5 tax = $12 per share cash! Yahoo cash $1.6 per share $12 + $1.6 = $13.6 cash(current price $14.90) Yahoo EPS average estimation this year $1.03(high estimation $1.14) and next year $1.17(high estimation $1.5), Yahoo positive cash flow $1.36B per year. Yahoo growth this year 25%, next year 13.6% All Yahoo needs is a big big news!!! Then Yahoo would pop from $15 - $25! It takes patience though...

Message.Title: Dead money
Message.Msg: The share price is simply dead money. The pps will stagnate and most likely continue to go down from here, until Mayer does something positive, which is unlikely to happen for months. Free food for employees, how does that help margins. Taking the stock ticker price off the internal website, just proves that she thinks the stock is going down in the near future. No need to put money in this stock at this point, as it will be cheaper next week, and the week after, and the week after.....Unfortunatley I jumped back in at 14.90 about 10 days ago, if I get back to even before this day ends I am out and will buy back in around $14

Message.Title: Is the New Message Board Format Better than the Old?
Message.Msg: Can someone list the advantages of the new format? I don't see many. The older format seemed better to me. Maybe I was just used to it. The red star system is gone in the new version.

Topic.Title: Is the New Message Board Format Better than the Old?

Message.Msg: Of course, the red star rating system encouraged spammers to give themselves 5 stars.

Topic.Title: Is the New Message Board Format Better than the Old?

Message.Msg: The format stinks. A message board is meant to read not a click and search fest. The old presentation was easy to scan messages and see who was replying. The new format uses up more space with extraneous #$%$ not associated with reading the messages and replies. I had no desire to look for another site until this change but now i will start looking.
